name: Tiny Rugby
description:
With over 75 challenging levels, TINY RUGBY puts your kicking skills to the test. 

Master kicks for any distance, take on high-speed winds, curve your shots, please the crowd! 

Multiple game modes:
- Arcade
- Time Attack
- Training

Enter the compact world of TINY RUGBY and take a trip back to your childhood; flicking toy balls over pencil goals for hours. 
Just one more kick! Gotta hit that coin!

-----------------------------------------------------

Controls

- Click and drag

-----------------------------------------------------

Tiny Rugby was originally designed for mobile and can be downloaded for fee using the links below.
